sen.j: 有限会社上林春松本店（かんばやししゅんしょう ほんてん）は、京都市宇治市にある茶問屋である。
sen.e: Kanbayashi Shunsho Honten Ltd. is a tea wholesale store in Uji City, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: 京都市宇治市は京都府宇治市の間違いかと思いますが、そのまま翻訳しました。
sen.e: Kanbayashi Shunsho Honten Ltd. is a tea wholesale store in Uji City, Kyoto City.
Kanbayashi Shunsho Honten Ltd. is a tea wholesale store in Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 京都府に訂正しました。

sen.e: It was established in the Eiroku era (1558-1569).
It was established in the Eiroku era (1558-1569).
It was established in the Eiroku era (1558-1569).

sen.j: 現在の当主は、第14代 上林春松。
sen.e: The current family head is the 14th Shunsho KANBAYASHI.
The current family head is the 14th Shunsho KANBAYASHI.
The current family head is the 14th Shunsho KANBAYASHI.

sen.j: 茶の加工と販売を主な事業とし、茶道の家へ茶を収めるほか、百貨店などにも販路を持ち、World Wide Web上で電子商取引も行う。
sen.e: Their main business activities are processing and selling tea, and as well as delivering tea to master families of tea ceremony, they have sales channels in department stores, and also engage in e-commerce on the World Wide Web.

Their main business activities are processing and selling tea, and as well as delivering tea to master families of tea ceremony, they have sales channels in department stores, and also engage in e-commerce on the World Wide Web.

Their main business activities are processing and selling tea, and as well as delivering tea to master families of tea ceremony, they have sales channels in department stores, and also engage in e-commerce on the World Wide Web.

sen.j: 品揃えは、抹茶、玉露から番茶までをそろえている。
sen.e: Their lineup ranges from Matcha (green powdered tea) and Gyokuro (refined green tea) to Bancha (coarse tea).
Their lineup ranges from Matcha (green powdered tea) and Gyokuro (refined green tea) to Bancha (coarse tea).
Their lineup ranges from Matcha (green powdered tea) and Gyokuro (refined green tea) to Bancha (coarse tea).

sen.j: 製茶工場では見学を受け付けている。
sen.e: Their tea processing factory accepts tours.
Their tea processing factory accepts tours.
Their tea processing factory accepts tours.

sen.j: また、宇治市宇治橋通りに「宇治・上林記念館」を開き、茶の資料や製茶道具を公開している。
sen.e: They have 'Uji Kanbayashi Memorial Hall' on Ujibashi-dori Street, Uji City, where information of tea and tea processing tools are open to the public.
They have 'Uji Kanbayashi Memorial Hall' on Ujibashi-dori Street, Uji City, where information about tea and tea processing untnsils are open to the public.
They have 'Uji Kanbayashi Memorial Hall' on Ujibashi-dori Street, Uji City, where information about tea and tea processing utensils are open to the public.

sen.j: 茶問屋 有限会社上林春松本店
sen.e: Tea whole sale store Kanbayashi Shunsho Honten Ltd.
Tea whole sale store Kanbayashi Shunsho Honten Ltd.
Tea whole sale store Kanbayashi Shunsho Honten Ltd.

sen.e: 38 Ujitaera, Uji City, Kyoto Prefecture, 611

They have been in business for 450 years (established in the Eiroku era).
They have been in business for 450 years (established in the Eiroku era).
They have been in business for 450 years (established in the Eiroku era).

sen.j: 江戸時代は、「御物茶師」（ごもつちゃし）として宇治を仕切る。
sen.e: In the Edo Period, they took control of Uji as 'Gomotsuchashi (tea dealer patronized by the shogunate).'
During the Edo Period, they took control of Uji as 'Gomotsuchashi (tea dealer patronized by the shogunate).'
During the Edo Period, they took control of Uji as 'Gomotsuchashi (tea dealer patronized by the shogunate).'

sen.j: 1952年（昭和27年）に有限会社となる。
sen.e: They became a company with limited liability in 1952.
They became a company with limited liability in 1952.
They became a company with limited liability in 1952.

sen.j: 宇治・上林記念館（うじ かんばやしきねんかん）は、宇治橋通りにあるお茶の資料館。
sen.e: Uji Kanbayashi Memorial Hall is a museum of tea on Ujibashi-dori Street.
Uji Kanbayashi Memorial Hall is a museum of tea on Ujibashi-dori Street.
Uji Kanbayashi Memorial Hall is a museum of tea on Ujibashi-dori Street.

sen.j: 茶の資料や 製茶道具を展示する。
sen.e: Information of tea and tea processing tools are displayed.
Information of tea and tea processing tools are displayed.
Information of tea and tea processing tools are displayed.

sen.j: 建物自体も歴史的なものである。
sen.e: Its building itself is historic.
Its building itself is historic.
